content: I just got onboarded for texting and I was told to use my first and last name [with state in brackets]. Is it ok if I remove my last name or just keep an initial? Will this impact my Scale to Win account, which has my full name? I noticed many people on here including mods only have their last initial, so I hope it's ok if I do so too. Many thanks in advance!!
You don't need to remove your scale to win name. You can change your name to firstname last intial though.
Thanks Jack! And this won't affect anything else by doing so? Like will my discord and scale to win still be connected?
It will still be connected. Scale to win doesn't connect with discord in anyway.
Ok so the last name was only needed for the onboarding process?
Not really. Some of us have firstname last intial anyways.
Ok cool thanks for your help!
